title: Handwritting ID
content:
Anyone knows what font it is?

Thanks in advance

| [red.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131103090253/http:/typophile.com/files/red.jpg) | 4.18 KB |
author: Meriba

comments.content:
This is a Dafont font called **[Dali](http://web.archive.org/web/20131103090253/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1&ffam=Dali%20-%20Regular&fid=5773a0271b0eaa8e5bbb03e92ac5a0c0&fsize=60&text=At%20the%20time%20I%20wrote%20these%20words%2C&wrap=2)** - no info about the font designer.

------------------  
I found it using "Find my Font": [http://www.findmyfont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131103090253/http:/www.findmyfont.com/ "http://www.findmyfont.com")

Thank you very much!!

You are awesome! ;)
